tool_description: Type Racer API allows users to interact with the Type Racer platform for typing speed tests and competitions.

api_list.name: Login
api_list.description: Authenticate a user to access the Type Racer application.

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description: The password associated with the user's account.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address of the user.
